links.title: Evalscript to generate Discrete Classification Map imagery
Nomenclature mapping - band values Global Land Cover labels

raster:bands.description: main discrete land cover classification according to FAO LCCS scheme
raster:bands.name: Discrete_Classification_map

raster:bands.description: Classification probability, a quality indicator for the discrete classification
raster:bands.name: Discrete_Classification_proba

raster:bands.description: Forest type for all pixels where tree cover fraction is bigger than 1 %
raster:bands.name: Forest_Type_layer

raster:bands.description: Fractional cover (%) for the bare and sparse vegetation class
raster:bands.name: Bare_CoverFraction_layer

raster:bands.description: Fractional cover (%) for the cropland class
raster:bands.name: Crops_CoverFraction_layer

raster:bands.description: Fractional cover (%) for the herbaceous vegetation class
raster:bands.name: Grass_CoverFraction_layer

raster:bands.description: Fractional cover (%) for the moss & lichen class
raster:bands.name: MossLichen_CoverFraction_layer

raster:bands.description: Fractional cover (%) for the shrubland class
raster:bands.name: Shrub_CoverFraction_layer

raster:bands.description: Fractional cover (%) for the snow & ice class
raster:bands.name: Snow_CoverFraction_layer

raster:bands.description: Fractional cover (%) for the forest class
raster:bands.name: Tree_CoverFraction_layer

raster:bands.description: Fractional cover (%) for the built-up class
raster:bands.name: BuiltUp_CoverFraction_layer

raster:bands.description: Fractional cover (%) for the permanent inland water bodies class
raster:bands.name: PermanentWater_CoverFraction_layer

raster:bands.description: Fractional cover (%) for the seasonal inland water bodies class
raster:bands.name: SeasonalWater_CoverFraction_layer

raster:bands.description: Data density indicator showing quality of the EO input data (0 = bad, 100 = perfect data)
raster:bands.name: DataDensityIndicator

raster:bands.description: Quality layer regarding the change detection of the current mapped year to the previous mapped year.
raster:bands.name: Change_Confidence_layer

raster:bands.description: The mask of data/no data pixels.
raster:bands.name: dataMask

description:
Global Land Cover products at 100 m resolution are delivered annually by the 
[global component of the Copernicus Land Service](https://land.copernicus.eu/global/products/lc). 
The most recent collection 3 (version 3.0.1) of 100 m Land Cover products for the years 2015 - 2019 were generated from 
the PROBA-V 100 m and 300 m satellite observations and several other ancillary datasets with global coverage. 
These Land Cover products provide a main discrete land cover classification map according to UN-FAO Land Cover Classification System [LCCS](https://land.copernicus.eu/global/products/lc). 
Additional continuous fractional layers for all basic land cover classes which give the percentage of
a 100 m pixel that is filled with a specific land cover class, are also included in the Land Cover products to
provide more detailed information on each land cover class.
title: Global Land Cover
